credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Virgin and child with Saints.
medium: Pen and brown ink, sepia wash, over traces of sanguine.
description: Vertical rectangle.  The Madonna is sitting with the blessing Child standing behind her, upon a light pedestal standing upon steps.  Beside the group are two angels one of them carrying a cradinal's hat.  Beside the pedestal stand at left a bishop with a book and crozier, at right St. Cecilia.  In front of the pedestal are St. John the Baptist standing, St. Jerome sitting and visiting St. Thomas Aquinas kneeling in the background, above.
name: Drawing
